entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 3.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
